title: Strategies for Utilizing ChatGPT in STEAM Education: A Survey-Based Study with Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and understanding of STEAM education principles
context.additional_context: Learners are current or pre-service teachers participating in project-based learning to explore effective integration methods of ChatGPT in STEAM education settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliability and accuracy issues when designing STEAM education with ChatGPT and propose mitigation strategies.
Learners can compare and analyze ChatGPT applications across diverse STEAM fields (science, technology, engineering, arts, mathematics) to derive subject-specific utilization plans.
Learners can develop a ChatGPT-integrated educational model tailored to learner proficiency and educational environments based on survey data.

resources: STEAM Education Reference Guide (e.g., Nature Journal Case Analysis Materials)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
